semantic_identifier: [GOLD-180]: Canonicalize segment membership for impact reporting using chosen source of truth
title: Canonicalize segment membership for impact reporting using chosen source of truth

sections.text: Implement a segment canonicalization layer in Issue_Tracker’s impact-reporting pipeline based on the “source of truth” decisions from GOLD-179. Normalize segment identifiers/names and compute membership from the selected system (CRM or Customer_Analyzer) before aggregating impacted customers/revenue. Add a fallback for unmapped segments that flags them as “unknown/mismatched” rather than silently mixing definitions.
